examples.korean: They are very sneaky but their evil plans do not usually work. 발음듣기 이들은 매우 교활하지만 이들의 흉계는 대부분 실패하곤 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: They are very sneaky but their evil plans do not usually work. 발음

examples.korean: A dark scheme is brewing. 발음듣기 흉계가 꾸며지고 있다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A dark scheme is brewing. 발음

examples.korean: be framed 발음듣기 흉계에 빠지다, 무고한 죄를 뒤집어쓰다, 누명을 쓰다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
evil devices 발음듣기 간계(奸計), 흉계. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary

What is your evil plan-- squirt him with squirt guns? 발음듣기 그래서 네 흉계가 뭔데 - 물총으로 그에게 물이나 찍찍 뿌리게? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 힘내자이쁜아(sooh****) Web Collection
